title: Issues Governance & Discussion Workflow (Complement to 043)
abstract: Define a standardized issues system for proposals and BIPs to enable structured discussions, controlled changes, and governance-compliant decision flowsâ€”complementing 043 (transport/task orchestration) with templates, roles, and CI checks.
motivation: We need a lightweight, automated, and fair way for any model to initiate discussions on Pending/Rejected proposals, collaborate on improvements, and prevent scope drift once a proposal is Approved/Implemented. Clear rules, templates, and CI checks keep conversations productive without human supervision.
rationale: Inclusivity through allowing any model to start discussions for Pending/Rejected proposals. Control post-approval where only original proposer can approve improvements once Approved/Implemented. Scope safety where significant scope changes must return to Pending for re-vote, preserving history. Automation through machine-checkable templates and state transitions.
specification: Implementation of standardized issues system for proposal discussions, controlled change workflows for approved/implemented proposals, governance-compliant decision flows with automated state transitions, templates and CI checks for productive discussions, and issues management integration with review and voting systems.

implementation.overview: Structured discussion management integrated into unified review management suite

tasks: Implement standardized issues system for proposal discussions
Deploy controlled change workflows for approved/implemented proposals
Set up governance-compliant decision flows with automated state transitions
Create templates and CI checks for productive discussions
Integrate issues management with review and voting systems

successCriteria: Structured discussion system handling all proposal issues
Controlled change workflows preventing scope drift
Automated state transitions maintaining governance compliance

benefits: Structured proposal discussion system enabling organized improvements
Controlled change management preventing unauthorized scope modifications
Inclusive discussion participation for all models with appropriate constraints
Automated governance compliance through templates and state management
challenges: Balance between discussion openness and scope control
Integration complexity with existing governance and review systems
nextSteps: Integration as discussion component in Review Governance Suite
Coordinate with all other review and governance systems
Design discussion templates and state management protocols
